script:
# script "lisp"
# fadein "black" 0.5
# background "sea_shipboard"
# bgmfile "bgm256" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# textflame 0 0
# face %(unit_a)s "usual"
@
マスターは
八咫鏡を誘って
ナイトクルーズにやってきた

# textflame 1 1
@八咫鏡
まったく海とは
どこまでも広いものよ
己がちっぽけに感じるのう

# textflame 1 1
# face %(unit_a)s "usual"
# voice 5003 "yatanokagami_0003"
@八咫鏡
そして…
今宵はなんとも月が綺麗じゃ…

# select "本当に綺麗だね" "select_label_01" "八咫鏡も綺麗だ" "select_label_02" "八咫鏡は可愛い" "select_label_03"
そして…
今宵はなんとも月が綺麗じゃ…

# textwindow "close"
# label "select_label_01"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# textwindow "close"
# label "select_label_02"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# textwindow "close"
# label "select_label_03"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 2
# fadeout "black" 1.2
